channel.title: Pls help, making ppl use client
channel.description:
alot of people, use differnet clients which i want them to do use mine, otherwise my server gets all laggy. can nay1 help me? tell me how to do it, i found a brillant tut on it then, some1 removed on this forum ffs. so dont say use the search button its not easy as that/.
Thanks,
